authors: Matt Zaldivar, Thanks to Brian Shields and Benjamin Bandelow. I used their Exalted sheet as a starting point. Also Thanks to Lithl for help with the quintessence wheel. There are also many of my own improvements over my previous CWOD sheets
instructions: Mage: The Ascension Character Sheet for use in the classic World of Darkness, 20th Anniversary Edition.  Sheet Guide available at - https://wiki.roll20.net/mage_20th
